abilities.name: Angelic Weapons.
abilities.description: The solar's weapon attacks are magical. When the solar hits with any weapon, the weapon deals an extra 6d8 radiant damage (included in the attack).

abilities.name: Divine Awareness.
abilities.description: The solar knows if it hears a lie.

abilities.name: Innate Spellcasting.
abilities.description:
The solar's spell casting ability is Charisma (spell save DC 25). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:
At will: detect evil and good, invisibility (self only)
3/day each: blade barrier, dispel evil and good, resurrection
1/day each: commune, control weather

abilities.name: Magic Resistance.
abilities.description: The solar has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.
